name: Melody of Oppression
description:
THIS GAME WAS MADE FOR THE BRACKEYS GAMEJAM 2020.2.

It is more of a quick horror experience than a full horror game.

A demon is trying to enter your bedroom.

Your music keeps you alive !

Click to interact with objects and environment!
Your nightmare comes from your DOOR!
HIDE under the bed!
REWIND your music tape to survive!
SURVIVE UNTIL 5 AM!
